Name: Battle Imagine - Boarrier Tyrant
Description:
Activates or advances Boarrier Tyrant's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Boarrier Rush.

Stunt! Boarrier Rush
Summons Elite: Boarrier Tyrant to charge forward with tusks for 3s. Deals Attack Damage and knocks enemies airborne during the charge. Tusks rend the targets, inflicting Wound.
Upon the skill cast, the DMG dealt and healing of your Special Attack are increased for a period.
Wound: Healing received decreases by 50% for 10s.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
